column5: Does anybody have a good source for Walleye jigs. Want to get some swimming jigs. Thanks

They are not as easy to find as round head and some of the other styles. And, when you do, they are awfully expensive. I have purchased them from a catalog store by the name of Hagen's. But, you need to buy in relatively large quantities. I split the order with a friend. Try this web site: http://www.hagensfish.com/new.htm Frankly, I am not sure that they really perform that much better than round head jigs when you consider the additional cost.
